RelatedSentence: Other international observation missions approved by the Supreme Elections Committee are the Arab League , African Union ( despite a freeze on Egypt 's membership ) , Arab Parliament , Community of Sahel - Saharan States , Organisation of the Francophonie and nations belonging to the Common Market for East and South Africa will also observe the elections .
